title: The pleasant fable of Hermaphroditus and Salmacis. by T. Peend Gent. With a morall in English verse
author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
publisher: In Fletestreat beneath the Conduyt, at the sygne of S. Iohn Euangelyste, by Thomas Col(well) [i.e. T. Colwell]],
notes: Imprint from colophon. Correct form of printer's name from STC.
A verse translation, by T. Peend, from Ovid's Latin original.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
